name: maxonfjvipon/elegant-elephant
description: Small library of PHP primitives in EO style

scripts.cs-fixer dry: vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix src --dry-run -v && vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix tests --dry-run -v
scripts.cs-fixer fix: vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix src -v && vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix tests -v
scripts.pre-push: composer run-script "cs-fixer dry" && composer run-script phpstan && composer run-script test && composer run-script coverage
